name: Skeleton Words 13 Quiz | Word Play | 25 Questions

questions.text: LSK (An American state)
CRL (Any grass that produces an edible grain such as oat, wheat, rice, maize or rye)
QRS (The eleventh sign of the zodiac)
TTTL (Practising abstinence from alcoholic drink)
KLHR (An extensive arid plateau of South Africa, Namibia and Botswana)
PLL (Greek god of light, poetry, music, healing and prophecy)
CGR (Another name for a puma)
PNNNS (A mountain range in Italy extending over 800 miles)
RNTL (Another word for eastern)
VT (An Andrew Lloyd Webber and Tim Rice musical)
LS (An assumed name)
MDCR (Average or ordinary in quality)
LCHL (A colourless, flammable liquid produced by fermentation of sugars and also called ethanol)
S (In the Bible, the twin brother of Jacob)
PHNX (Legendary Arabian bird said to set fire to itself and rise anew from the ashes every 500 years)
FRSN (Any of several breeds of black and white dairy cattle having a high milk yield)
TTT (A military display or pageant, usually at night)
CHHH (A state of northern Mexico)
LFLF (A plant which has clusters of small purplish flowers and is used as a commercial source of chlorophyll)
SMRLD (The name of the gypsy girl in 'The Hunchback of Notre Dame')
KDS (Acclaim, glory or prestige)
PLDS (In Greek mythology, the seven daughters of Atlas placed as stars in the sky)
QB (The only seaport of Jordan)
questions.explanation:
Aqaba.

	It was captured from the Turks by T.E. Lawrence (Lawrence of Arabia) and ceded to Jordan in 1925.

questions.text: STRLRP (A heavy black breed of domestic fowl laying brown eggs)
GS (In Greek mythology the shield of Zeus often represented in art as a goatskin)
questions.explanation:
Aegis & Egis.

	Hope you enjoyed this tricky quiz.
